name: Honeybee Harvest
description:
Spring has arrived and flowers are blooming! It's time to collect honey from these flowers but beware of evil insects who wants to mess with you.

 Shoot the evil insects with your sting but be careful not to hurt the flowers.

 Survive as long as you can in this endless survival honey collecting game. How long can you survive?

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 52 whose theme is : Harvest.

Control scheme:

Numpad keys = Move around.

X = Shoots bee sting.

Enter = Confirm/Pause the game.

F8 = Take a screenshot.

Features:

- Can move and shoot in 8 directions.

- Increasing difficulty.

- Cool tracks by Avid and Eric Matyas

Enjoy this honey collecting survival game! :D
